org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.caches

Class ConcurrentCacheStoreBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.caches.ConcurrentCacheStoreBase<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssetTagCache, CSSDocumentCache, FileScopeCache, MXMLDataCache, PackageNamespaceDefinitionCache, SWCManager, SWFCache

    public abstract class ConcurrentCacheStoreBase<T>
extends Object
    A key-value pair cache store that supports concurrent access.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public final T get(CacheStoreKeyBase key)
        Get a value from the cache store. If the cache doesn't have a valid entry, it will obtain the value, add to the cache and return the value.

        The implementation is thread-safe. The API looks like a "read" access, but when the cache doesn't have a hit, it will write an entry to the cache table. The first attempt queries the cache, so the read-lock allows parallelized read if no other thread is writing the cache. If there's no hit, the second attempt is to create a valid entry, store it in the cache and return it. This requires upgrading the read-lock to a write-lock.

        Parameters:
        key - cache key
        Returns:
        cached value

      • remove

        public final T remove(CacheStoreKeyBase key)
        Remove a value from the cache
        Parameters:
        key - cache key
        Returns:
        value for removed entry if an entry was removed.

      • size

        public int size()
        Get size of the cache table.
        Returns:
        size

      • createEntryValue

        protected abstract T createEntryValue(CacheStoreKeyBase key)
        Concrete class must implement this method to create a cache value object. Do NOT add the value to the cache in this method. get(CacheStoreKeyBase) is responsible for reading and writing the cache table.
        Parameters:
        key - cache key
        Returns:
        object to be cached.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
